QuestData.Title: Building Your Own Coffin
QuestData.Description: Once it's complete, we're going to need to get this bomb down to Saurboz.$b$bAnd by 'we', I mean 'you'.$b$bWith so many of the enemy prowling about, I'll need to create something special if you're to have any chance of success.$b$bI can modify one of these busted shredders, but I'll need a few parts. You should have no trouble finding them in the woods to the west.$b$bRound them up while I finish work on the bomb.
QuestData.LogDescription: Foreman Jinx wants you to collect 3 Bronze Cogs, 3 pieces of Copper Plating, and 5 Locking Bolts.
QuestData.CompletionText: You got those parts I need, friend?
QuestData.RewardText: This looks right, $c.$b$bI should have your shredder put together in no time.
